Are you using some kind of script for zeromail to automatically read sign and publish new ids (like zeroids python script)? Or you are doing it manually? If so can you share it?

PS do you think we can use something like that http://127.0.0.1:43110/16KzwuSAjFnivNimSHuRdPrYd1pNPhuHqN and avoid spamming?

> [nofish](#comment_8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): The hub feature is required because technical reasons, but like i also written there: if you don't want to trust the hub owner, then you can create your own hub

Yes but one site per person could allow pulling data from other sites linking and querying and users could have more control over their data i think hub solution is more complicate and it does not scale. How else this will implemented?  Connections to peers may be optional and not seed all sites but selecting what users/sites and how many you want to follow. Also who they want to follow/seed...
